alert.note: Alert for Greene; Martin; Pitt (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 16 at 10:42AM EST until January 16 at 2:00PM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Additional ice accumulations of a trace to a couple hundreths of an inch. * WHERE...Greene, Martin and Pitt Counties. * WHEN...Until 2 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light freezing rain or drizzle will continue into the early afternoon hours across the coastal plain especially for the northwestern portions of Pitt, Greene, and Martin counties where temperatures will remain at or below freezing the longest. Some additional minor ice accumulations are possible. Slick spots will continue, especially on bridges and elevated highways.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Carolina can be found online at DriveNC.gov.
